metadata.Title: CVE-2017-11751 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - low.
metadata.Description: The WritePICONImage function in coders/xpm.c in ImageMagick 7.0.6-4 allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (memory leak) via a crafted file.

notes.Note: mdeslaur> 0128-CVE-2017-11751.patch in unstable 0259-CVE-2017-11751-Fix-remote-denial-of-service-memory-leak-in-WritePICONImage.patch in wheezy not fixing memory leak in trusty and xenial

criterions.comment: imagemagick: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
